ComicInfo.Summary: It's the beginning of an epic showdown that will change The Spider forever! The Fly is the Spider's most dangerous enemy - a wealthy madman with no goal but power - and no hesitation to kill. Richard Wentworth has sacrificed happiness in order to protect the city he loves, but is he prepared for the betrayals to come?
